itemLabel: Michael Stewart, Baron Stewart of Fulham

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Michael Maitland Stewart, Baron Stewart of Fulham,  (6 November 1906 – 10 March 1990) was a British Labour politician and Fabian Socialist who served twice as Foreign Secretary in the first cabinet of Harold Wilson.

response: ** Michael Stewart, Baron Stewart of Fulham, British politician (b. 1906)
